children.title: Google Captcha
children.desc:
1. For recaptcha , please register your website first on https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/start and get the API key.
Then include it in your html in following manner.
2.For internationalization , please add the language code as the querystring parameter to the script tag
<script src='https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api.js?hl=ar'></script>.
For complete list of language codes , please visit https://developers.google.com/recaptcha/docs/language

children.title: Data Tables
children.desc: Basic data table comes with all the default functionalities like sorting , searching , pagination , filtering responsiveness etc .For all the list of options please refer https://datatables.net/reference/option/

children.title: Search DataTable
children.desc: By default , the search field searches the value among all the columns . If you want a particular column not to be looked into while searching , please set the parametersearchable :false while intializing .Target is used to tagret the column using index starting from 0.

children.title: Responsive DataTable
children.desc:
If responsive parameter is set to true , by defalult , in mobile , the columns will start striping out from right and will be shown on click of plus icon. If the user dont want to show the details , please set the parameter detail : false .
To set the priority of columns to hide them on responsive screen , user has to set the responsivePriority< /span>.

children.title: Ajax Loaders
children.desc:
We have included following 3 ajax loaders
1. small loader (32px x 32px)
2. big black loader 100px x 100px
3. big white loader 100px x 100px
For generating customized loaders please visit http://www.ajaxload.info/

children.title: Stepwise List
children.desc: For 3 column steps , please use the class three-steps on the tab-component div. Similarly for 4 steps and 5 steps list , use the classname four-steps and five-steps respectively.

description: For aligning any element(Generally text) only on mobile screens ,please use the class mob-align-[dir] where dir is one of the values among {center,left,right} . Please Note this will not impact the alignment of element on tablet and deskop screens.

children.title: overlay popup
children.desc:
For any overlay popup , get the content from the div and use the following script functions .
DT.modalPopup.createPopup: to create the popup It take following four parameters:
1. jquery wrapped object of the div from where we need to get the data(URL of the iframe SRC in case of iframe content).
2.class name to be attached to the popup outermost div
3.(boolean parameter) do we need to open the popup content in an iframe.
4.(optional paramter) path to the ajax loader that needs to be shown while iframe content loads up.
DT.modalPopup.showPopup: to show the popup It takes the reference of the created popup as parameter.
DT.modalPopup.hidePopup: to hide the popup It takes the reference of the created popup as parameter.

children.title: Range Slider
children.desc: Please include jquery-ui.css and jquery-ui.js to make this range slider work .

children.title: 2 column
children.desc: For the table like eservice details , use the table on encompassing div and for each row use <div class='row'> . For the heading , add the head class to the row element

children.title: grid layout

description: This section is for the timeline of dubai trade evolution.

children.title: Left
children.desc: For floating any milestone towards the left of the timeline , use the class align-left on the div with class milestone-wrapper

children.title: Right
children.desc: For floating any milestone towards the left of the timeline , use the class align-right on the div with class milestone-wrapper

children.title: Without Load More
children.desc: If all the milestone are loaded and no more children are left for lazy loading , add the class has-no-more-children on timeline-container
